summary:
	Biopharmaceutical professional with 7.5 + years of rich industrial experience with amalgamation of formulation research development for pharmaceutical industry and strategy with business development for excipient industry.
	Innovation idea generation towards formulation development of parenteral stream based complex generics, antibody drug conjugate, protein therapeutics, long acting microparticulate depot injectable formulations, liposomes, microspheres and novel drug delivery systems (NDDS) projects with emphasis towards understanding unmet clinical and pharmaceutical needs, disease prevalence, patient compliance and adherence to therapy.
	Strong scientific understanding and product development experience using Quality by Design (QbD) approach with emphasis towards QTPP, CQA, CPP, CMA, design of experiments and control strategy.
	Project Lead with focus towards identification & evaluation of CMO/CRO, preparing formulation strategy, interaction with cross functional team for updating development status. 
	Deep understanding of intellectual property (IP) with focus towards extracting claims, understanding freedom of operation towards development of non-infringing formulations.
	Opportunity finding, market intelligence, technical support to sales team, management and development of diversified product portfolio, in-licensing and out-licensing for drug delivery systems using novel excipients from varied range of key principals/manufacturers.
	Support the business strategy by developing a portfolio of customers and a healthy project pipeline.

currentPositions.description:
	Opportunity finding, Market intelligence, Technical support to sales team, maintaining opportunity pipeline, periodic project review and communication with excipient Principals, customer client orientation, integration of digital promotion with SAP and salesforce,finding share shift opportunities,  in-licensing and out-licensing for developed drug delivery systems using novel excipients from varied range of key suppliers.
Technical support in following areas: 
	Development of drug delivery systems comprising pharmaceutical parenteral products with an aim of ANDA filing of niche molecules of class A clients.
	Development and mitigation for complex injectable drug delivery systems comprising liposomes and microspheres.
	Key role in unravelling client queries related to Activated PEGs and Phospholipids based complex injectables (liposomes and targeted drug delivery systems) sourcing from NOF Japan.
	Development of alternative indigenous adjuvant system and its evaluation against commercial adjuvant with respect to their safety and efficacy.
	Development of Antibody Drug Conjugates and their characterizations in the field of oncotherapeutics.
	Development of pH responsive drug delivery system to carry Doxorubicin payload in cancer therapy. 
	Biophysical and Biochemical characterization of Protein Therapeutics (Light Scattering, Thermal analysis, Chromatographic separation of size and charge related species, higher order structure analysis, mass spectrometry, HPLC).
	Application of existing excipients from suppliers for development of injectable dosage forms (solutions for reconstitution)
	Completion of Six Sigma Green Belt certification and Operational excellence

message.text:
Thank you to all our stakeholders for your active participation in the technical session and for making this event a great success! Your enthusiasm and engagement were truly inspiring. Looking forward to our next event!
#pharmaceuticals #drugdelivery #formulationdevelopment #ashland

DKSH and Ashland recently co-hosted a successful technical seminar at DKSH India’s Mumbai office. In this seminar, experts from DKSH and Ashland showcased our product offerings to the participants. 

Mr. Ajay Dantuluri and Mr. Saurabh Gupta from Ashland’s team discussed about the product portfolio, new launches, shared insights on Nitrosamine impurities, and Ashland’s approach towards controlled nitrite offerings.

Dr. Sachin Salunkhe, pharmaceutical expert from DKSH, discussed about our product offerings, new launches, and the recent trends in the pharmaceutical industry. 

Explore Ashland’s product portfolio here: https://lnkd.in/dyJbARw4 

Click here to learn more about DKSH India: https://lnkd.in/dXP7BFDM 

#DKSH #performancematerials #pharmaceutical #pharmaceuticalinnovation

We would like to announce our strategic business partnership with our client TdB Labs, Sweden.
Product comes from Polysaccharide derivatives as Dextran sulfate sodium having application in colitis studies and targeted drug delivery systems.
#dextran #drugdelivery #pharmaceuticals #formulationdevelopment #toxicology

DKSH is excited to share that we have entered into a distribution agreement with TdB Labs, a leading Swedish biotech company specializing in developing and manufacturing dextran derivatives and other polysaccharides, in India.

DKSH's Business Unit Performance Materials will provide business development, marketing, sales, logistics, and distribution services for TdB Labs’ range of dextran derivatives and other polysaccharides for pharmaceutical companies and diagnostic laboratories across India.

Click here to read more: https://okt.to/3n6Dhj

#DKSH #performancematerials #pharmaceutical #TdBLabs

🏆 Delighted to be honored with the "Enriching People's Lives" award at DKSH's annual strategy meet and Fantree awards 🎉. This recognition reflects our unwavering commitment to excellence and innovation across all facets of our business. A big thank you to our exceptional team and loyal clients for their continued support. Special gratitude to our visionary leader Mr. Vishal Jawale; Managing Director & Country Head, South Asia- DKSH India Pvt Ltd., for his invaluable guidance and mentorship. Heartfelt thanks to Ricky Kumar; Director of Country Human Resources, and Vinod Rathod; Director of Country Finance and CFM, for their empathetic support and cohesive direction. Pre-dilective orchestration, guidance and encouragement always remained a driving force and I can't t thank you enough to Zeljko Pockaj; Vice President Global Pharmaceutical Industry DKSH. Much appreciate to Pharma industry segment lead Lokesh Karkare, for his noteworthy contributions. Here's to sustained success and creating a positive impact! #AwardWinning #Innovation #Teamwork #Gratitude #EnrichingLives #DKSH #sustainability

We are excited to announce that we are in exclusive distribution agreement with Southern RNA for serving ingredients associated with nucleic acid based therapeutics in the space of vaccines, cell and gene therapy.
Thanks to the team from Southern RNA and DKSH for your support. 
Garry Heaney Romain Tropée Zeljko Pockaj  Lokesh Karkare Vishal Jawale Miguel Jones Lobo  Shreyoshee Guha Aishwarya Salvi Himali P.
#mrna #drugdelivery #vaccines #cellandgenetherapy #pharmaceuticals

ingestedContentSummary.description: Mumbai, India, March 18, 2024 - DKSH's Business Unit Performance Materials, a leading distributor of specialty chemicals a nd ingredients, will provide business development, marketing, sales, logistics, and distribution services for Southern RNA's cutting-edge messenger ribonucleic acid ( mRNA ) raw material and vaccines in India.
ingestedContentSummary.title: DKSH Signs Exclusive Distribution Agreement with Southern RNA in India

message.text:
DKSH is excited to share that we have signed an exclusive distribution agreement with Southern RNA 🧬, a leading manufacturer of high-quality mRNA raw materials and drug substances, in India.

DKSH's Business Unit Performance Materials will provide business development, marketing, sales, logistics, and distribution services for Southern RNA’s innovative messenger ribonucleic acid (mRNA) raw material and vaccines.

Click here to read more: https://okt.to/HzxTka

#DKSH #performancematerials #pharmaceutical #SouthernRNA #innovativemRNA

Thrilled to announce our DKSH 's ongoing collaboration with Southern RNA! 🤝 Grateful for the insightful assets and learning opportunities this partnership brings. 🌐 #Collaboration #bioasia2024 #nucleicacid #drugdelivery #vaccines

Day 1 of BioAsia 2024 immersed Southern RNA into Genome Valley, India's nucleus for life sciences R&D and #manufacturing. The journey began with a comprehensive briefing on India's pharmaceutical market, led by Trade and Investment Queensland (TIQ) and Mr. Asit Saxena from PwC India, laying the groundwork for understanding the country's expansive pharma landscape.
A visit to Bharat Biotech proved enlightening, showcasing groundbreaking vaccine innovation leveraging live-attenuated virus vaccine manufacturing. SRNA then explored Sai Life Sciences Ltd Sciences, witnessing their commitment to advancing pharmaceutical R&D. These visits highlighted the seamless integration of science and industry, crucial for accelerating pharmaceutical discovery to delivery.

The day concluded with a thought-provoking twilight panel discussion and a dinner hosted by Australian Trade and Investment Commission (Austrade), fostering meaningful connections and shedding light on Australia's role in the life sciences sector.

Stay tuned for more insights as SRNA continues to navigate the dynamic landscape of #BioAsia2024, where each conversation and visit propels them toward the future of healthcare and medicine.
